title: (7400) Ponte de Sor - 60 Estrada de Abrantes 119
title_short: (7400) Ponte de Sor - 60 Estrada de Abrantes 119
description: Parking lot at the Intermarche, very cheap fuel here

title: (7400) Ponte de Sor - 28 Rua Alexandre Robalo Cardoso
title_short: (7400) Ponte de Sor - 28 Rua Alexandre Robalo Cardoso
description: Service area and paid night for motorhomes, has a barrier and there is time to check in and collect the keys. water and drain. Keys and registrations must be collected at the Ponte de Sor Tourist Office from Monday to Saturday. from 9 a.m. to 7 p.m.

title: (7400) Ponte de Sor - 6 Rua Doutor Manuel José Fernandes
title_short: (7400) Ponte de Sor - 6 Rua Doutor Manuel José Fernandes
description: Wide residential road next to park and sport complex, plenty of shade. 5 min walk to number of restaurants & supermarket. Peaceful

title: () Ponte de Sôr - 8 Avenida Manuel Pires Filipe
title_short: () Ponte de Sôr - 8 Avenida Manuel Pires Filipe
description: Parking in the city center. Nice place in green zone.

title: (7400) Ponte de Sor - Rua Miguel Torga
title_short: (7400) Ponte de Sor - Rua Miguel Torga
description: Drinking water fountain with a good flow even in summer

title: (7400-232) Ponte de Sor - 4 Rua do Rossio
title_short: (7400-232) Ponte de Sor - 4 Rua do Rossio
description: Big Park on dirt, close to the river, few trees, good for launch

title: (7400) Ponte de Sor -
description: Flat parking a little out of the way, view of nature and the river.

title: (7400) Rosmaninhal - N244
description: A good night sleep in a forest of hundred-year-old cork oaks. Fires prohibited.

title: (7400) Galveias - N244
description: Natural Spring to fill up jerrycans, tasty natural water

title: (7425) Montargil - N2
description: Uncontrolled road water source

title: (7425) Montargil -
description: Very nice place in nature to rest, the national highway is not very far so there was a little noise from the cars

title: (7425) Montargil - N2
description: Very nice quiet spot.Ideal for small vans.At the morning some local fishermans.Very nice place for Sunrise.

title: (2205-175) - 1 Bairro Novo
description: Very quiet overnight parking, restaurant at 20m, bakery at 200m.

title: (7425) Montargil - N2
description: Near a large artificial lake, many spots to settle.  The least: many rubbish and toilet paper, testify a lot of squatte. More road next but not so much noise. Most: very charming setting, swimming and fishing possible, shade and many places to put the vehicle. Maybe a bit more difficult to access, in some places, for big motorhomes.

title: (7425) Montargil -
description: Beautiful place near the lake. Peaceful and calm

title: (7425) Montargil - N2
description: Easy access, great shades and awesome view. Perfect for small campervans. In front of the water.

title: (7425) Montargil - N2
description: Breathtaking, breathtaking, magnificent views over the lake. Complete silence with nature all around. Great place to watch the stars and sunrise, RVs are forbidden

title: (7425) Montargil -
description: Amazing view. Hard access. only 4x4 vehicles.

title: (7425) Montargil -
description: Optimal place to park in nature

title: (7425) Montargil - N2
description: Perfect place to spend an afternoon. We have been alone all day. It seems like a quiet place to spend the night. Narrow track access, better with a van.

title: (7480) Benavila - N370
description: Magical place at the lake of the dam of Maranhao - absolute calm, possibility of bathing (but access to the stony lake) magnificent view. Very (too) hot day in the summer but night and night on top! In the evening horses come to drink at the lake not far from us. Several spots along the lake

name: Senhora de Entre-águas,Benavila
title: (7480) Senhora de Entre-águas,Benavila
description: Six picnic tables in middle of olive trees between “Nossa Senhora de Entre-águas” 15th century chapel and Maranhão lake/dam, about 1 km N of Benavila. Extended view over dam, very nice at sunset. Chapel is national monument. Very old olive tree in front of main door.

title: (7480) Benavila -
description: Lake view, open air with storks

name: Parque de Campismo Orbitur Montargil
title: () Parque de Campismo Orbitur Montargil
description: 4 km north of the village of Montargil, this Orbitur Group campsite is located on the banks of a huge artificial lake. Pleasant and well equipped certainly, but without soul. Lots of chalets, mobile homes and rather young locals who get together on weekends to play the guitar and party with a beer in hand! Swimming pool, bar / snacks, convenience store, excellent wifi connection in the area reserved for motorhomes and TV reception without problem. Quality sanitary facilities and very well maintained.

title: (7425) Montargil - N2
description:
Praia Fluvial do Pintadinho. Just ov
er the lake outside Orbitur permisses. Stayed a night and great for morning dive, but also during holidays on a Monday. Enjoy!

title: (7440) - N369, ponte romana Vila Formosa
description: Approximately 100 m before East top of very well kept Roman bridge called “Vila Formosa”; nice place in nature with 5 tables and benches. Also suitable for overnight stays. The N369 is audible. Attention: you can reach here only from the East, because bridge is closed for cars. Without service.

title: (7425) Montargil - Unnamed Road
description: Nice place, close to the water, with some shade.

title: (7425) Montargil - Unnamed Road
description: Awesome place to relax. Easy road. Easy access

title: (7425-130) Montargil - 22 Rua Manuel Alves do Carmo
title_short: (7425-130) Montargil - 22 Rua Manuel Alves do Carmo
description: Confirmed the possibility of staying for the night with local police (GNR)

title: (7480) Avis - N244
description: Small corner near Avis. Rather reserved for 4x4. Not very flat, but with the holds it's ok. Nice view of the lake. For one night no more ..

title: (7425) Montargil - 71 Rua Heróis do Ultramar
description: Quiet for overnight stay

title: (7425-125) Montargil - 20 Rua Heróis do Ultramar
description: Public car park. Straight places. About 20 spots. Crane is located at the exit of the wheelchairs to the football spot. Do not discharge waste water. Keep the place clean.

title: (7425) Montargil - 1B Rua Luís de Camões
description:
Public parking lot

with WiFi , very calm and with restaurants and coffee nearby

title: (7425) Montargil - 8 Praceta Salgueiro Maia
description: Public free park next to a road... 1 night and no problems. Nice view a few meters from the park

name: Avis, Clube Náutico
title: (7480) Avis, Clube Náutico
description: Quiet place to spend one or two nights. During the day it can be crowded but at night it is lonely. It has easy access for caravans of up to 7 meters, with room for 2 vehicles. There is a restaurant nearby and a campsite that was closed today. The guard told us that there was no problem parking and even sleeping. It does not have any services but it is ideal to spend a quiet night.

title: (7480) Alcôrrego -
description: Quiet place surrounded by nature to spend the day and night. The land is slightly sloping and access is dirt, but we managed with a 7 meter long motorhome. There were other people parking next to us, but the night was quiet.

title: (6040) Gavião - Rua da Fonte Nova
description: Motorhome area - conditioned access (as alternative to electronic procedure of access via an app, climb up 300m till firemen installation and pay them). With 6 little unleveled places and 4 service spots with electricity. Barbecue and toilet. Illuminated. Good location to use services or overnight (200m away from N 118 road), but hard walking till Gavião small town (better move to there to visit or shopping).

title: (6040) Gavião, Portugal - N118
description: It's the football stadium parking lot, which always seems to have space and it's pretty quiet. There is a water outlet, but it was dirty, maybe because it's not really used

title: (7425) Montargil - Unnamed Road
description: Beautiful corner isolated from the world here at Montargil dam. Silence, lake to swim, eagles flying around, great bird watching and the best part no one around. If you come here be respectful and don’t make fires or trash the place.Bumpy road with sharp turns must be hard if wet but we came in summer so it was dry. A big fig tree close by if you are lucky to be here on the right season for it.

title: (6040) Gavião - Rua Francisco Ventura
description: Gravel leveled soil area used as parking by cars, buses and trucks, where you can stay overnight.

title: (7425) Montargil -
description: With view for montargil dam, quiet and peaceful. Near the water. Don't sleep here because it's part of Natura 2000.

title: (7425) Montargil - N2
description: Beautiful view to the river. Very quite.

name: Parque de Campismo Municipal de Ortiga
title: (6120) Parque de Campismo Municipal de Ortiga
title_short: (6120) Parque de Campismo Municipal de Ortiga
description:
Camp site private 
The beautiful surroundings were devastated by a fire in the summer of 2017.
The site is quiet and neat. Prices are cheap and people are nice. There are no shops around so don't forgot to shop before arriving.

name: Ribeira da Venda
title: (6040) Ribeira da Venda
description: Nice place to spend day and overnight (no lightning) on both borders of very small river, 6 km away from N 118 road. Bar/restaurant owner told me the water was drinkable. There is a food button to get the water out. Children's playground and pools for them and adults; tables and grill with wooden and metal grid. Picturesque channel, with Roman bridge (now used as pedestrian). Bar closed off summertime, may be on Sundays rest of year;it’s Wi-Fi works. The toilets are not open but wooded. It's a real campsite, but without staff. Washbasin, tent area, playground. At the entrance there is a 3.5 t prohibition sign; as alternative and more flat, 100 m further turn to gravel way to the other riverside. Hiking PR 3. If you do not feel safe to overnight, drive to Comenda village where there is extended flat illuminated P at beginning of village (left side of road).

title: (6040) Comenda (Castelo Cernado) - Unnamed Road
description: Parking of Ribeira da Venda beach. Very nice place to stay, has WC, shower for free, and place to washing your dishes. Also has an amazing surrounding.. Free pool for kids and a new one for adults. Stayed one nigth and had a very relaxing day. It also has a bar.

title: (7480) - Unnamed Road
description: Beautiful place at the reservoir very quiet.

title: (2205-033) Abrantes - Rossio ao Sul do Tejo - Av. Marginal do Tejo
title_short: (2205-033) Abrantes - Rossio ao Sul do Tejo - Av. Marginal do Tejo
description: Parking - Overnight up to 24 hours

address.city: Abrantes - Rossio ao Sul do Tejo

title: (2205) Rossio ao Sul do Tejo - 5 Travessa do Cavaco
title_short: (2205) Rossio ao Sul do Tejo - 5 Travessa do Cavaco
description: Public toilets in front of the river.

name: ParqueTejo - Turismo, Ciência e Lazer (Parque de Campismo e Caravanismo)
title: (2205) ParqueTejo - Turismo, Ciência e Lazer (Parque de Campismo e Caravanismo)
title_short: (2205) ParqueTejo - Turismo, Ciência e Lazer (Parque de Campismo e Caravanismo)
description: Nice camping park with a view over the  Tagus (Tejo) River and Abrantes town hill. Very nice  prices and facilities. All services are free (lot of combined electricity/fresh water plots). Restaurants and grocery stores within walking distance.

title: (2205) Rossio ao Sul do Tejo - 16 Rua do Carvalho
title_short: (2205) Rossio ao Sul do Tejo - 16 Rua do Carvalho
description: Along the Tejo with tables and barbecue.

title: (6040) Gavião - Unnamed Road
description: Good gravel parking for the night. The other spot next to it is forbidden to the motorhome, the Police monitors .. The train goes on the other bank but not disturbing, just the guard dogs of the houses are watching you and barking. 4G full bar.

title: () Abrantes - Esplanada das Docas
description: Parking at the Rio Tejo directly at a busy restaurant and pub, which is open on weekends until 3 am.  There are several waste containers nearby.  Directly opposite on the other side of the river is an event venue where events such as fairs and concerts are held.  There is also the possibility to fill up with water, as well as to dispose of grey water and the toilet.

title: (2200) Abrantes - 708 Avenida da Portagem
description:
With a great view to the Ríver Tejo. no facilities. 
This is an authorised location. Overnight stay Up to 48 hrs

title: (2200-201) Abrantes - Esplanada 1 de Maio
description: Super large motorhome parking with a bird's eye view of the Tagus, just behind the courtyard, ideal for a quiet night. Free parking without amenities, which is also used by passenger cars. Amusement center next door, lots of shopping and parties every night.

title: (2200-365) Abrantes - 26 Rua 17 de Agosto de 1808
description: Very central flat parking with an incredible view towards south. very calm. fantastic night 200m away from the main brand new museum of Abrantes, very worthy to visit. obligatory to eat at the Santa Isabel restaurant and buy the wonderful sweets at the Palha de Abrantes coffee shop.

title: () Abrantes -
description: Park dedicated to motorhomes next to Historic Center

title: (2200-241) Abrantes - 3 Rua do Girassol
description: Free parking near the city center except market day.

title: (2200-420) Abrantes - 37 Rua do Pisco
description: Shop where gas bottles can be exchanged. Also the Campinggaz bottles. Not an LPG station. It is also difficult to get there with a camper / car. I went by bicycle. Have been looking for a shop to exchange camping gas bottles for a long time. You can do that here!!

title: (2200) Abrantes - Estrada do Gaio
description: Station service in abrantes, has free water, black water disposal and WC cleaning. Little supermarket inside and coffe shop. Outside has picnic tables.

title: (2140) - 2 N243
description:
At the entrance to the village of Chouto Nationale 243, new motorhome area, gray and black water drainage, water tap, 12 electricity outlets (currently disabled).
200 meters from the center where there is pharmacy, restaurants, small supermarket.
Quiet, easy access to any size motorhome.
On-site garbage can is very small but just outside the gate is a bigger blue bin that is also a garbage can (see last photo).

title: (2200) Abrantes - E806
description: Service station with picnic area, dump station and water. Cartridges or pipe systems,  not a drive on  dumping grate

title: (2200-024) Alferrarede - 1B Rua Vasco da Gama
description: Intermarche services. free black and grey drains. tokens from the petrol station for electric hook u and drinking water. intermarche, bricomarche and car wash and garage next door. Clean services easy access. close to historic monument.

title: (2200-187) Abrantes - 221 Rua Cidade de Parthenay
description: Self Service Laundry

title: (2200-024) Alferrarede - 12 Rua Doutor David Serras Pereira
title_short: (2200-024) Alferrarede - 12 Rua Doutor David Serras Pereira
description: Church square in Alferrarede. Free parking to share with locals. The bells do not ring after 20h.

title: (2205) Tramagal - 62 N118
description: Free water supply for motorhomes. Picnic tables.

title: (2200) Abrantes - Parque de Abrantes
description: Picnic and bbq areas across the road in a lovely park.

title: (2200-491) Abrantes - R. de São Jerónimo
description: Parking lot on the edge of the city park São Lourenço in Abrantes, which offers children's playgrounds, barbecue and snack areas. A beautiful duck lake invites you to relax. Hiking trails and mountain bike trails in the immediate vicinity.

title: (2205) Tramagal -
description: Wonderful place to stay one night beside de river Tagus. very calm but a litle bit slopy. enough for 2 or 3 campers. we spent One night with the noise of the surrounding trees and the ducks at the river.

title: (7440-022) Alter do Chão - 196 Avenida da Coudelaria de Alter
title_short: (7440-022) Alter do Chão - 196 Avenida da Coudelaria de Alter
description: Public parking next to the castle and the municipal market

title: (7440) Alter do Chão - N369
description: Free parking

title: (7440) Alter do Chão - 2 Rua das Amoreiras
title_short: (7440) Alter do Chão - 2 Rua das Amoreiras
description: New paid aire in Alter de Chao, price including electricity. Reasonable flat area and good access to the town

title: (7430) Crato - Rua 25 de Abril
description: Future service station near the pools

title: (7440) Alter do Chão -
description: Intermarché with laundry facility on parking lot. Cheap fuel here as well.

title: (7430) Crato - 23A Rua António José de Almeida
title_short: (7430) Crato - 23A Rua António José de Almeida
description: Public park in the vilage

title: (7430) Flor da Rosa - Av do Condestavel
title_short: (7430) Flor da Rosa - Av do Condestavel
description: In front of the Flor da Rosa Monastery. Very quiet and with flat squares. The monastery, despite being a pousada, can be visited.

title: (2230) Sardoal - N2
description: Quiet location by night, 300m away from EN2 road crossing and 150m from petrol station, with parking places not very flat to sleep. There are picnic tables, trash cans, water and a playground. About 500m away from lower area (several old fountains) of historic center of Sardoal village.

title: (2230) Sardoal - Unnamed Road
description: The name of the spot is LAPA Nice and quite place (except warm weekends). With barbecue and tables. To the village is 2km the only problem is that during the night it is dark and if you need help no one will help you. I don't recommend to sleep there. (2017) This year the fire devastated some of his beauty. In the winter is more beautiful that in the summer, but in the summer you can swim and refresh. Has been remodeled this summer (2017).

title: (7490) Cabeção - Unnamed Road
description: Cool place, near a road. Super quite. Great place to see the sunrise and sunset

title: (7490) Cabeção -
description: Nice plateau for motorhomes separated from the campsite with the possibility of emptying and filling up with water. Very friendly caretaker, speaks a little French but very good in English. Very calm place.

title: (7490) Cabeção - Unnamed Road
description: Flat land in the forest on a paved road, a little deformed by tree roots but widely practicable by all types of vehicles. This path stops at the level of a house that seems abandoned or perhaps a second home ... Very quiet, I was able to fall asleep with songs of locusts and / or cicadas in the distance. In the middle of the night, an animal came to pay me a visit around surely a hare; which woke me up but nothing bad. Thanks to this little stealthy alarm clock, I could hear an owl or an owl that was flying in the distance. And in the morning, it was very nice to wake up with different bird songs .. I highly recommend !!!

name: ESA (Estação de Serviço Autocaravanas)
title: (7490) ESA (Estação de Serviço Autocaravanas)
description: ESA (Estação de Serviço Autocaravanas). Close to the Mora fluviario. Small campsite with all amenities and service area for motorhomes.

title: (6120) Santarem - Ribra de Paia Fome
description: A viewing area with picnic benches, a wisteria-covered pergola, and great views of the tree-lined hills and river below. It is also on a very quiet road.

title: (6120) - Ribra de Paia Fome
description:
Beautiful.spot
Picnic área
nature
natural lake

name: Barca da Amieira
title: (6050) Barca da Amieira
description: Just on left Tejo riverside at bottom of road to very small ferry. Currently, 2022-November, it is still under construction/improvement. 2 barbecue areas are built, the solar-powered small ferry too, 1 toilet house is set up for the hikers. Beginning of “Trilho da Barca da Amieira” wooden hiking, 3,6 km long.

title: (6120) Mação - 3 Alameda Infante Dom Henrique
description: Large paved parking lot. Close to the GNR and the center which has no interest. Public WC. Good satellite reception.

title: (2230) Sardoal -
description: Motorhome and full service area, on SARDOAL small town (even on iconic EN2 road), which historic center and shops are accessible by walking. The key must be picked at the fire department.

title: (2230) Sardoal - Travessa Do Freião
description: Place to park maximum 4 motorhomes. 400m till local products shop (“Cá da Terra”) and cultural center. 750m till historic center (buildings and streets from XVI century; pillory) and tourist office.

title: (7490) Pavia - 78 Rua 25 de Abril
description: A place surrounded by nature on the banks of a very pleasant and easily accessible river. On the other side of the shore you can see bulls. It is a fishing spot but there is none today. possibility to go further on the way.

title: (7490) - Unnamed Road
description: Easy access place for motorhome, with the beautiful river where you can bath. There are some picnic areas and a grill. It was very quiet to sleep as there is little traffic

title: (7490) Mora - Rua do Barco
description: River beach of Mora, fishing possible, swimming in summer, picnic table, barbecue. Quiet, calm by the river. To avoid in rainy weather because not tarred. Accessible to all sizes of motorhome.

title: (7490-225) Mora - 6 Rua da Estação
description: The museum car park was the only straight car park I found in Mora. There is a small parking lane parallel to the road just in front of the entrance of the museum (that's where I parked) and about 15-20 parking spaces across the road, which can be used with a not too long van. Since the campsite I drove to was closed, I also parked here. No problems and quiet (until the neighbor's rooster started crowing). There is a café on the right at the end of the museum, waste bins and a small park behind the museum.

title: (2140) Cantarinhas - Unnamed Road
description: I spent at ease with my 10T, 3 days in the pampas without seeing a cat;]

title: (7490) Pavia - N251
description: Portugal, Évora district, Alentejo region, somewhere between Mora and Pavia. We could not just pass the signpost to the dolmen of 'Cromeleque das Fontainhas'. The first pictures show why our decision was made quickly, this will be our bedroom for tonight. No service.

title: (2100) Couço - Ponte de Santa Justa
description: Good place for the night and the rest, at the edge of the river and the garden.

name: CAMPING ENVENDOS
title: (6120) CAMPING ENVENDOS
description: Location 10 x 10 m approx. Field surrounded and we live on the spot. Warning !! There is no electricity, sanitation or emptying. You can have the services electricity and emptying free to 5 km. located in a very quiet place. In the heart of the mountains, village within 500 m. Climbing, fishing, ideal hiking. Grocery, bar, tobacco, restaurant. Free swimming pool nearby at 100 m Baker passing on the ground If you like the peace it is by here!

title: (6050) Amieira do Tejo - Trilho da Barca da Amieira - E top
title_short: (6050) Amieira do Tejo - Trilho da Barca da Amieira - E top
description:
Beautiful little free P in the hills just on left Tejo riverside, totally quiet. Spectacular view of the nearby dam and some fun hiking paths with art installations in nature. Very easy access on tarnac road. No services, no water. 
For vans up to 6m max (due to marks on floor of P), so not convenient for big motorhomes.

address.street: Trilho da Barca da Amieira - E top

title: (2100) Couço - 36 Rua do Comercio
description: Charming circular parking lot near N4 and very close to the village of Courço. Two free water terminals picnic tables and play area for children. Garbage cans in the tuff car park opposite. Very peaceful night!

title: (6050) Amieira do Tejo - Access to Barca da Amieira Trail
title_short: (6050) Amieira do Tejo - Access to Barca da Amieira Trail
description: Flat asphalt area (it was used for Fratel dam construction mobile residence) on isolation ambience at evening and night. Good place to overnight, very quiet and safe besides no lightning. Just a couple of trains during the night on opposite Tejo riverside. 5 min away from IP 2, near Fratel dam, so perfect if you are travelling. Very good to watch stars when no moonlight.

address.street: Access to Barca da Amieira Trail

title: (2250-020) Constância - Avenida das Forças Armadas
description: Self service laundry which was installed in March 2019 at the entrance of the camp site. Three machines 18kg 8kg washers and 18kg drier. Cafe next door.

name: Alma do Zêzere camping
title: (2250) Alma do Zêzere camping
description: Very nice camping near the river and in a typical village. Not expensive.

title: (7460-136) Fronteira - N 245 Ponte Ribeira Grande - N.
title_short: (7460-136) Fronteira - N 245 Ponte Ribeira Grande - N.
description: Extended P related to municipal swimming pool. Very nice area even to overnight. The river, the park is lit up at night. Wooden hiking trail “Passadiço da Ribeira Grande” starts opposite side of the bridge till Fronteira village. In S zone of village, interesting building about Atoleiros battle (in 1384; search “Centro de Interpretação”). NOTE: strong flood damaged bridge in 2022-Dec and road is cut; so, access only from N (via Alter do Chão).

title: (7460) Fronteira - Ponte Ribeira Grande - S
description: This is a small car park close to left riverside. Toilets open at the beginning of April. Very quiet. Besides swimming on river (low level) there is swimming pool on opposite riverside. Wooden hiking trail “Passadiço da Ribeira Grande” starts on top of bridge till Fronteira village. Museum about Atoleiros battle (in 1384), in S side of village, is very interesting (search “Centro de Interpretação da Batalha de Atoleiros”). Interior of church on top of this hill (“Senhora da Vila Velha” - ask visit on adjacent house) also nice. NOTE: bridge was damaged by strong flood in 2022-Dec, so road is cut 500m before.

title: () Praia do Ribatejo - N3
description: Free parking and service point, worth a night or two. Lots of flat parking overlooking river & bridge. Pretty village 5 mins walk over the bridge with shops. Beware steep drive direct to bottom level, if you access by entering top level (left) first the next slope is much better.

name: Barragem de Fratel - IP 2
title: (6030) Barragem de Fratel - IP 2
description: Free flat P on Northern top of Fratel dam, Tejo river, without shadows. Perfect for a lunch stop! Nice views, path for walk.

title: (7460) Fronteira -
description: Picnic tables by the river with barbecue, there are trees so shadows. NOTE: strong flood in 2022-Dec, that overpass bridge and damaged it, may damage leisure equipment.

title: (6050) Amieira do Tejo -
description: Small quiet place to spend the night by the water under the eucaliptos

title: (2250) - Unnamed Road
description: Parking to visit downtown Viva Science Astronomie. For Myores and children. We spent one night without a problem. Only there was wind. Superb view.

title: (7490) Pavia -
description: Beautiful spot by the river, just off the main road. Spot for fishing. You can hear the road but it’s not too busy.

title: (2140) Praia do Ribatejo - N118
description: Panoramic view of the Almourol Castle. There are no support services available, but for a night you can stop for a rest.

title: (7470) Cano - Avenida do Rancho Folclórico
description:
Mix parking in the middle of the village.
Restaurant and café nearby

title: (6050) Alpalhão - 2 Largo Doutor António Alves da Costa
title_short: (6050) Alpalhão - 2 Largo Doutor António Alves da Costa
description: Gravel parking with few leveled places, inside village but aside stone paved road to Castelo de Vide. Toilets and water next to a playground. Several cafés, restaurants and pastries nearby. Easy walking to historic center; several modern granite sculptures inside village.

address.street: 2 Largo Doutor António Alves da Costa

title: (7460) Fronteira - Unnamed Road
description: Free flat illuminated parking not marked on floor related to sportive zone, so convenient use out of busy hours. 4 places for up to 7,5m long between trees; others around. 150m away from atoleiros battle (1384) museum (“centro de interpretação”); coffee-bar at 100m. Easy access and quiet to overnight.

title: (2260) Vilha Nova Da Barquinha - EM1191
description: Tarmac car park near a railway line (no traffic from 11 p.m. to 4 a.m.) Sadly daytime parking only…informed by GNR officers.

title: (7490) Pavia - 21 Rua de Aviz
description: Pavia viewpoint (= “Miradouro”) with 2 picnic tables aside impressive very olive tree; and others around. I arrived with 7,5m motorhome but transit inside streets can recommend shorter vehicles.

title: (6120) Vale Grou -
description: Place pour dormir avec une vue incroyable, compliqué de monté en camping car.

title: (7460) Fronteira - Rua da Estação
description: Good place to stay one night by the former train station (with lot of tiles panels all around well kept), aside school. Flat, illuminated, free, quiet, without trees (hot on summer daylight). Just behind train station is cycling track “Ecopista Atoleiros-Sulfúrea” following former train way.

title: (2300) - Unnamed Road
description: Parking very close to the water or for real off-roaders you can park by the water . very nice and calm. few People were enjoying the place on a weekend.

title: (6030) - Autoestrada da Beira Interior
description: Rest area is the main Highway (Motorway), A23, it has free water has air for check pressure in tires. Very clean bathroom, and good breakfast, with local products. Fill your tank of fuel and water (free and large flow). It has gas pump and bottles. Very good stop!

name: Camping Lake Portugal
title: (2300) Camping Lake Portugal
description: Super nice campsite in the countryside by the lake. Quality restaurant with local products. Ideal for discovering Portuguese cuisine. Hospitality and impeccable services (and in French). Very good address!

description: Nice and quiet place to pass day and night

title: () Vila Nova da Barquinha - EM1190
description: Very quiet place at night, next to a beautiful park and by the river. Parking and cobblestone pavement, but no traffic at night. Free wifi working only during the day. Well-done and free service area.

title: (2300) Tomar - 128B Bairro Hidroeléctrica do Zêzere

description: River Praia of Carvoeira. Nice river pools in a very beautiful natural environment. Parking on a slight slope. There is a bar, bathrooms and covered area with tables and grills with sink.

title: (6050) Nisa - 19 Rua dos Lusíadas
description: Launderette open from 08:00 to 22:00

title: (6050) Nisa - 3 Rua dos Lusíadas
description: Asphalt and quiet free public P, located just opposite the Intermarché supermarket (also has cafeteria) inside small town of Nisa. No sign prohibiting parking. It's pretty but very noisy due to shopping users after 08:30. This P is not charming; there is another behind NW that is quieter.

title: (2230) Souto -
description: Schöner Platz am See mit Badezugang. 2 Marmor Picknicktische. Gerader Stellplatz. Sehr steile Zufahrt bergab, für mutige Fahrer. Nicht für Wohnmobile.  NICHT größer als VW Bus. Achtet auf das Wetter. Regen—> rutschig

name: Câmara Municipal da Golegã - Município da Golegã
title: (2150-269) Câmara Municipal da Golegã - Município da Golegã
title_short: (2150-269) Câmara Municipal da Golegã - Município da Golegã
description: Municipal campsite of Golegã. Beautiful, quiet municipal campground in the village, near the Igreja. Space levels for many motorhomes. Bird watching. Large clean bathrooms, hot water, full services. The reception closes at 5:00 p.m. ⚠️

name: Posto de Turismo de Nisa
title: (6050-350) Posto de Turismo de Nisa
description: Flat and lighted free public park very close to the central garden and next to the tourist office and craft shops. Not suitable for vehicles over 6.5 m in length. Easy pedestrian access to the historic center.

title: () - Unnamed Road
description: Beautiful place in nature with natural swimming pools, a waterfall where you can swim (5 min. walk) beautiful playground for the kids, very nice hiking trails of wooden planks, toilets and (cold) showers. With larger campers you can stand on the plateaus. At 8.5 m it was easily accessible. Busy on weekends.

title: (6050) Nisa - 43 Estrada das Amoreiras
description: Park with water fountain and tables for outdoor meals.

title: (6050-327) Nisa - 38 Rua Doutor Sidónio Pais
description: Large paved parking lot. Without services. Busy street during the day. 20 minutes walk from the center of the medieval village.

title: (2150) Golegã - Rua dos Castelões
description:
Grátis, calmo, tranquilo e seguro. Sem serviços. Bom para pernoita durante a feira da Golegã, embora concorrido. A 5 minutos a pé do centro da Cidade.

Free, quiet, quiet and safe. No services. Good for overnight stay during the fair of Golegã, although crowded. 5 minutes walk from the city center.

title: (2260) Moita do Norte - 71 Rua Salgueiro Maia
title_short: (2260) Moita do Norte - 71 Rua Salgueiro Maia
description: Intermarche park, laundry machine with coin, could park day and night, gas station, park outside.

title: (2150) Golegã - 43 Rua Timor Lorosae
description: Service terminal at the Intermarché da Golegã

name: Quinta das Lameiras
title: (2300) Quinta das Lameiras
description: Hello friends Our humble Biological Farm with an area of ​​3ha. We are 9km from the Templar city of Tomar, 4km from the river beach of Alverangel, 2.5km from the clean water river. Train station 3km away. We can be your Uber. We have a Hostel4campers with enough space for campers, caravans and some tents. Access to private bathroom; Common interior room (40m2 with sofas, swings and area for children to play; free kitchen with large table, free fridge, only washing machine and gas stove are paid ; There is also a outdoor leisure area with swings. Electricity 10amp; Disposal of dirty water and access to drinking water. Fresh homemade bread.. We can have a traditional Portuguese meal. We look forward to welcome you. Don't hesitate to visit our profile on Instagram (quinta_das_lameiras) or FB (Quinta das Lameiras - Sº Pedro de Tomar). We have a small grocery store where you can find products from our farm and other farmers. Depending on the season we have vegetables, fruit, eggs, cottage cheese, olive oil and duck meat, lamb, chicken and turkey, rice, tuna, vinegar, etc. Being happy is the most important thing! Our backyard is the world! Love of João, Sara and Children

title: (7470) Sousel - 12 N245
description: Large flat and illuminated gravel parking, without shadows, in front of tourist office and municipal library. Easy walking access to village center.

title: (6110) Vila de Rei - Unnamed Road
description: Very nice quiet place on the lake. We are alone here at the moment of writing. This place is not suitable for large campers, the road to it is unpaved, potholes and low hanging branches. With a 4x4 van with/or roof tent, like us, is very nice! what a rest.

title: (2300) - 60 Estrada Barrinho
description:
Small sandy parking very particable. Just above the beach.
Very quiet at night.
The pleasure of the small evening at the water's edge and the morning splash.
Easy and accessible half-turn for all types of vehicles.

title: (6110) Vila de Rei - Rua da Praia
title_short: (6110) Vila de Rei - Rua da Praia
description: Edge of Lake, quiet, small which with picnic table

name: Área Serviço Autocaravanas da Erra
title: (2100) Área Serviço Autocaravanas da Erra
description: Installation specially designed for motorhomes. Part of an outdoor "pay" parking network. Check the website on the information board at the entrance. Google will probably take you down a dirt road with a narrow bridge. Suggest finding an alternate route if you have a large vehicle. On the edge of a quiet village.

title: (2300) - Estrada dos Montes
description: Parking of the fluvial beach. Very calm.

title: (6150) São Pedro Esteval - N351
description: Local picnic area with trash bins, drinking water and a sheltered barbecue area

title: (6050) - N18
description: Small pic nick area, but with a very clean and fresh fountain with water

title: (6050) Sao Simao - EM526
description: Park without gradient next to secondary road (with little movement), possível overnight. With WC.

name: Camping Bubulcus & Bolotas
title: (7040-700) Camping Bubulcus & Bolotas
description: Nature camping area. Completely sustainable. Electricity available (CEE), but high consumption equipment is NOT allowed as it is all off grid. Reservation is recommended.

title: (6110 183) Vila de Rei - 3 Avenida Sá Carneiro
title_short: (6110 183) Vila de Rei - 3 Avenida Sá Carneiro
description: Free service area

name: Piscina Municipal de Fratel
title: (6030) Piscina Municipal de Fratel
description: Service area easily accessible from A23 highway (search 150m gravel access direct from N 3 road, km 176,3, instead via village where you should have to bypass swimming pool!) with gravel free space to P and overnight (not illuminated and a bit unleveled). On summertime, open air swimming pool open and corresponding snack and toilets. Swimming pools (outdoor pools) in Portugal are generally only open from middle June to the end of August/September. NOTE: when swimming pool functions, access to service area during daytime may be impossible :-( because cars park under trees.

name: Camping Redondo
title: (2300-035) Camping Redondo
description: Camping REDONDO near TOMAR A garden of exceptional rarity warm welcome very clean and functional facilities A garden with various species swimming pool and barbecue

title: (2300) - Estrada Ribeira
description: Chaotic path, much too steep, very difficult to access and a lot of large mosquitoes on site. We did not stay. I do not recommend at all.

title: (7040-612) Vimieiro - 7 Rua da Fonte
description: Picnic area, with tables, parking and shade

title: (2240) - N348
description: Perfect to spend the day and sleep, very quiet. There are stairs that lead to a bathroom area.

title: (6110) Vila de Rei - Unnamed Road
description: Centro Geodésico de Portugal, Vila de Rei, ponto mais central de Portugal. Geodesic Center of Portugal, Vila de Rei, most central point of Portugal.

title: (2240) - N348
description:
Small gravel car park with magnificent view of the lake. Some cars parked during the day. Quiet night, access to swimming. Single electricity plug inside a little warehouse free to use.
very nice view, access to the river, in the next beach there is a swimming pool.

title: (6150) Vale Água -
description: Nice and easy access tap next to the road. Good water pressure.

title: (6110) Melriça - N2
description: Nice place with lots of trees. It's located on N2 route. Has a nice fontain and some tables. Public toilets too.

title: (6120) Corujeira - Estradão Praia Fluvial (Ponte da Ribeira Bostelim)
title_short: (6120) Corujeira - Estradão Praia Fluvial (Ponte da Ribeira Bostelim)

address.street: Estradão Praia Fluvial (Ponte da Ribeira Bostelim)

title: (2240) - Unnamed Road
description: Superb isolated location surrounded by nature, next to a chapel (S. Pedro de Castro) Magnificent view of the lake. Calm assured. The access is through a secondary road, a bit difficult at its end. More suitable for 4x4.

title: (6150-214) Peral - 22 Rua da Escola
description: Very peaceful place. Only the sound of owls can be heard. The church bell rings from 7 am to 10 pm.

title: (2240) Ferreira do Zêzere - CM1065
description: Miradouro do Castro, Ferreira do Zêzere

title: (7050) Ciborro - Largo do Povo
description: Small public parking, leveled and illuminated, on upper top of “Largo do Povo” square in CIBORRO village, 50m away from road EN 2. Parking free on evening and night, usually, enough for 2 or 3 motorhomes. Quiet during night. It lies 100m away from iconic km 500 of tourist road track EN 2 and associated bar/restaurant. There is also fuel station on the road and small dam (= “barragem”). Dam is 1,5 km away by good gravel road; nice to a very quiet night and stars watching. Public toilets, clean, 250m to S (in small blue&white garden).

name: Parque de Campismo do Bostelim
title: (6110) Parque de Campismo do Bostelim
description: Rural campsite (Summer time) but external flat parking open all year round. Inside camping, electricity, hot water shower, wc, grills, lots of shadows, river beach. Access to electricity and water.

title: (6110) Zaboeira - 1 Rua da Ladeira do Lombo
title_short: (6110) Zaboeira - 1 Rua da Ladeira do Lombo
description: Good place to spend the night. Quiet and illuminated. Good view of the river.

title: (6100) Marmeleiro - Unnamed Road
description: Nice and quiet place! It's a fluvial beach unfinished! Can swim, have grills too, my dog likes it too!!
